articles.author: Tobias Hoonhout, Tobias Hoonhout
articles.title: CDC Refused to Test First Possible Community-Transmitted Coronavirus Case for Days
articles.description: The CDC confirmed a coronavirus case in California on Wednesday evening, with UC Davis Medical Center revealing that they had requested a test last week.

articles.author: Mairead McArdle, Mairead McArdle
articles.title: Pence Announces White House Coordinator for Coronavirus Response
articles.description: Vice President Mike Pence has appointed the administration's top AIDS official as head coordinator in tackling the coronavirus in the U.S.

articles.author: Tobias Hoonhout, Tobias Hoonhout
articles.title: Japan to Close All Schools until April to Slow Coronavirus
articles.description: Prime Minister Shinzo Abe announced Thursday that Japan will close its schools until April in a bid to halt the spread of coronavirus.

articles.author: Zachary Evans, Zachary Evans
articles.title: California Monitoring 8,400 People for Coronavirus, 33 Have Tested Positive
articles.description: California is monitoring 8,400 people who arrived on domestic commercial flights for the Wuhan coronavirus, Governor Gavin Newsom announced on Thursday.

articles.author: Tobias Hoonhout, Tobias Hoonhout
articles.title: Warren Proposes Bill to Shift ‘Racist’ Wall Funding to Coronavirus Effort
articles.description: Senator Elizabeth Warren announced that she was introducing a bill to divert all funds appropriated by the Trump administration to fund a border wall in order to combat the coronavirus.

articles.author: Rich Lowry, Rich Lowry
articles.title: ‘The White House Shouldn’t Downplay the Coronavirus’
articles.description: I wrote today about the political danger to the administration of seeming to dismiss coronavirus fears.

articles.author: Rich Lowry, Rich Lowry
articles.title: The Testing Problem
articles.description: What seems most worrisome about our coronavirus response so far is a lack of widely available tests.
